title.narrative: PREVENTION, DIAGNOSIS AND MONITORING OFMALNUTRITION

description.narrative: The health system has improved capacity to adequately prevent, diagnose, and monitor all forms of malnutrition in children and adolescents., which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Child Health, Child Health (Covid), Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition (Covid), Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, child and adolescent malnutrition in all its forms is reduced, with a special focus on overweight and obesity.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The health system has improved capacity to adequately prevent, diagnose, and monitor all forms of malnutrition in children and adolescents.
